DOC.brief_summary: This 8-week , single centre , randomize , parallel-group , double-blind , placebo-controlled Phase IV study evaluate effect dapagliflozin tissue specific insulin sensitivity patient Type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dapagliflozin 10 mg Insulin Resistance Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
